item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Tuesday, December 17, 2024 at 12:35 PM UTC
item.description:

11. 20 years of Linux on the Desktop (part 2) (12 points | 1 comment)

17. Kubernetes Spec Explorer (43 points | 7 comments)

19. Golang 1.24 is looking seriously awesome (14 points | no comments)

24. Go union type proposals should start with their objectives (5 points | no comments)
